original: Lundholm, Stig Gustav, leg. läkare, Uddevalla, f. 14/11/17 i Luleå av jägmäst. Karl G:son L. o. Emy Skog-ström. G. 45 m. Greta Ståhl. — Stud:ex. i Luleå 36, med. kand. i Sthlm 38, med. lic. 43. Andre und :läk. v. pensionsstyr. kuranst. i Vänersborg 44, förste und rläk. 45, und:läk. v. rönt-genavd. v. las. i Uddevalla 47. Hobby: schack (Sverigemäst. i schack i Lidköp. 44).
translated: Lundholm, Stig Gustav, certified physician, Uddevalla, b. 14/11/17 in Luleå to forester Karl G:son L. and Emy Skog-ström. Married in 1945 to Greta Ståhl. — Completed high school in Luleå in 1936, received a Bachelor of Medicine in Stockholm in 1938, and obtained a medical license in 1943. Served as a second assistant physician at the pension board's sanatorium in Vänersborg in 1944, first assistant physician in 1945, and assistant physician at the X-ray department at the hospital in Uddevalla in 1947. Hobby: chess (Swedish chess champion in Lidköping in 1944).
